item.title: Add Operous.dev to Security Tools
item.description: https://operous.dev/ - Cloud instance testing tool with a comprehensive and automated set of test-suites of best practices, performance, and security. Free tier offers 100 testing minutes, 10 Test Suites, and up to 5 instances to 1 user.

item.title: Add Mastershot video editor
item.description: https://mastershot.app - Completely free browser-based video editor. No watermark, up to 1080p export options.

item.title: Update Okteto Cloud Free plan
item.description: https://okteto.com - - Managed Kubernetes service designed for remote development. Free developer accounts come with 5 Kubernetes namespaces, 3Gi/pod with a maximum of 8Gi/namespace, 1CPU/pod with a maximum of 4CPUs/namespace and 5GB Disk space. The apps sleep after 24 hours of inactivity.

item.title: Added reCaptchaMe
item.description: https://recaptchame.com/ - free reCAPTCHA and hCAPTCHA backend service. No Server-Side coding needed. Works for static websites.

item.title: Update WebScraping.AI Monthly Limit
item.description: https://webscraping.ai - Simple Web Scraping API with built-in parsing, Chrome rendering and proxies. 2000 free API calls per month.

item.title: Added PingPong pro plan offering
item.description: https://pingpong.one/ - Advanced status page platform with monitoring. Free tier includes one public customizable status page with SSL subdomain. Pro plan is offered to open-source projects and non-profits free of charge.

item.title: Add pingpong.one
item.description: https://pingpong.one/ - Advanced status page platform with monitoring. Free tier includes one public customizable status page with SSL subdomain.
